short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QuickDict is an extension that helps to accelerate looking up Japanese vocabulary

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickDict makes it easier to look up any Japanese vocabulary or grammar you come across when surfing the web. You have the options to search for the selected text on Jisho, Goo, Takoboto and DeepL, an up-and-coming translation site.

To search, simply select/highlight any Japanese phrases and right click on it. In the QuickDict menu, select your preferred dictionary.

You can also choose to save any vocab you want to review later, and display them through the extension popup. To see the list of phrases you saved, click on the extension icon in the top right corner of Google Chrome

(If you don't the QuickDict icon, click on the puzzle piece icon to show Chrome extensions and pin QuickDict)
